[skipslow] skip

! go test -x coverbad
! stderr '[\\/]coverbad\.test( |$)' # TODO(matloob): Is the quoting correct here?

-- coverbad/p.go --
package p

func f() {
	g()
}
-- coverbad/p1.go --
package p

import "C"

func h() {
	j()
}
-- coverbad/p_test.go --
package p

import "testing"

func Test(t *testing.T) {}
